objectives: Evaluate different viewpoints on household chores
Create original dialogues about household chores

multiple_intelligences.linguistic: Write a story or essay about household chores
multiple_intelligences.logical_mathematical: Analyze patterns and create logical arguments about household chores
multiple_intelligences.spatial: Create visual representations or mind maps of household chores
multiple_intelligences.bodily_kinesthetic: Role-play or act out scenarios related to household chores
multiple_intelligences.musical: Create a song or rhythm exercise about household chores
multiple_intelligences.interpersonal: Collaborate in groups to discuss household chores
multiple_intelligences.intrapersonal: Reflect individually on personal connection to household chores
multiple_intelligences.naturalistic: Categorize and classify concepts related to household chores

content.basic: Simplified texts and basic vocabulary about household chores
content.intermediate: Standard complexity materials with support about household chores
content.advanced: Complex authentic materials and academic texts about household chores

process.grouping: Individual, pairs, small groups, or whole class based on preference
process.choice: Multiple activity options aligned with learning style

differentiation.environment: Open space allowing movement and hands-on activities

warm_up.description: Students move around and interact physically related to household chores
warm_up.materials: Space for movement, props if needed

main_activities.description: Students receive information about household chores through kinesthetic modality
Students practice language related to household chores using kinesthetic approach
Students produce original content about household chores demonstrating advanced thinking

discussion_prompts: What are the implications of household chores for society?
How would you design a better approach to household chores?
What criteria would you use to evaluate household chores?

vocabulary_support.tier_2: Academic and topic-specific words for household chores
vocabulary_support.tier_3: Domain-specific technical terms related to household chores

homework_options.required: Core assignment at advanced level using kinesthetic approach

teacher_notes.grouping_suggestions: Flexible grouping based on readiness and interest
teacher_notes.time_management: Build in flexibility for different pacing needs

common_difficulties: Students may lack background knowledge about household chores
Vocabulary may be challenging for some students
Some students may need more processing time
methodology: UDL + Differentiated Instruction + CLT + Multiple Intelligences
references: CAST Universal Design for Learning Guidelines
